subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
Weather
Rain
Lightning
lead_paragraph: Fred Funk took the lead at the Senior British Open at 11-under 129, a 36-hole record for the event. Tom Watson, the runner-up at the British Open, was seven shots off the lead.
snippet: Fred Funk took the lead at the Senior British Open at 11-under 129, a 36-hole record for the event. Tom Watson, the runner-up at the British Open, was seven shots off the lead.
